title: ProKeR: A Kernel Perspective on Few-Shot Adaptation of Large Vision-Language Models
details: Y Bendou, A Ouasfi, V Gripon, A Boukhayma - arXiv preprint arXiv:2501.11175, 2025
abstract: The growing popularity of Contrastive Language-Image Pretraining (CLIP) has led to its widespread application in various visual downstream tasks. To enhance CLIP's effectiveness and versatility, efficient few-shot adaptation techniques have been …
